summary: An ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to purchase $5,000.00 Pierce County, Washington 5's due Nov. 1, 1928 at $101.95 and accrued interest; $5,000.00 City of Tacoma 4 1/2 due July 1, 1929, at $100.65 and accrued interest, and appropriating $10,250.00 or as much thereof as may be necessary from the water bonds sinking fund.
